comments:
Driver:  0603I

- Launch the Web Service Explorer.
- On the UDDI page, click the combo box for Favorite Registry.  

You'll notice that the names are not externalized.  For example, it's showing:

%PUBLICUDDIREGISTRYTYPE_NAME_IBM_TEST

This problem is everywhere in the UDDI page.

When trying to publish service, the operation never returns and the following 
error is in the catalina log:

java.lang.NullPointerException
	at 
org.eclipse.wst.ws.internal.explorer.platform.perspective.MessageProvider.getMes
sage(MessageProvider.java:39)
	at 
org.eclipse.wst.ws.internal.explorer.platform.uddi.perspective.UDDIPerspective.i
nitPerspective(UDDIPerspective.java:88)
	at 
org.eclipse.wst.ws.internal.explorer.platform.perspective.Controller.init
(Controller.java:109)
	at wsexplorer_jsp._jspService(Unknown Source)
Changed Version field given new release numbering.
*** Bug 92443 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***

Created an attachment (id=24100)
patch that fixes this problem 

This fix involves making sure paths are correct in different areas according to
flexi projects
*** Bug 102202 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
*** Bug 103071 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***

Fix committed to the org.eclipse.jst.ws.consumption.ui and the 
org.eclipse.wst.ws.parser plugins.
